name: Beautiful Fully Furnished 1BR Downtown Boston
neighborhood_overview: The financial district is a fast paced environment during the work week and very quiet on nights and weekends.  Perfect for a work trip or a getaway, it's located close to everything you want.  Fanueil Hall, North End, Seaport, Back Bay and Beacon Hill are all about a 10-15 minute away!  Also, due to this central downtown location, we want to add a disclaimer that you may hear any of the following city noises - nightlife, construction, traffic.
description:
This 1BR apartment is located in a 12 unit building in Boston's Financial District. It is located conveniently from major hospitals and public transportation hubs. You're 2 blocks from coffee shops, lunch spots, bars right in the hustle of downtown Boston.

The space
An air Mattress and linens can be provided for an additional cost.

Guest access
You have access to the entire apartment as well as common shared laundry on site. It is coin-operated.

Other things to note
Due to this central downtown location, we want to add a disclaimer that you may hear any of the following city noises - nightlife, construction, traffic.

License number
Exempt: This listing is a unit that has contracts with hospitals
